caption: At a meeting, a group of people was discussing something. Nearby, a woman stood, trying to convey something to them, but they expressed opposition. Suddenly, a person stood up, walked around, and delivered a speech. Then, he ordered the killing of everyone. The woman appeared greatly shocked and fled.In another location, a person was captured and bound, surrounded by an enraged crowd that wanted to kill him. However, an older woman protected him, and he was tied up instead.Meanwhile, in a room, a woman was confiding in another person, appearing deeply remorseful.
